question: Name the bank that has launched a new 'Yellow Army Savings Account' to increase its customer base through its association with Chennai Super Kings.
explanation: Equitas Small Finance Bank has launched a new 'Yellow Army Savings Account' to increase its customer base through its association with Chennai Super Kings. The yellow army savings account will offer an interest rate of 6% per annum for balance below ₹10 lakh and 6.5% per annum for balance above ₹10 lakh. Equitas will be the principal sponsor of CSK and the banking partner of CSK for 3 years.
